message:
高二的时候看肖申克的救赎，有个单词institutionalized极其突出，也在想，自己是不是也已经被体制化了呢
（我们不是闲的没事做，而是被固化的感觉）如下
Brooks ain't no bugs. He's just institutionalized.The man's been here for 50 years,50 YEARS. This is all he knows.In here,he is an important man.He is an educated man.Outside,he is nothing.Just a used-up con with arthritis in both hands.Probably couldn't get a library card if he tried.You believe whatever you want,Floyd.But I'm telling you,these walls are funny.First you hate 'em.Then you get used to 'em.Enough time passes.You get so you depend on 'em.That's institutionalized.They sent you here for life.That's exactly what they take.The part that counts,anyway

果然今天还没结束，已经有同学给我发消息说还是上学好，现在惶惶不可终日，上学有事干。

进监狱的时候，看着那些墙，你很憎恨，但后来，你开始熟悉起来，最后，你离不开那些墙了

哈哈哈，休息下来居然从奢侈品变成了毒药，究竟是谁的错

这就是所说的体制化吗，调教成了奇怪的样子
title: 高考结束，然后高二的时候的问题出现了
